expectedFindings.pattern: donateToReserves affects exchange rate without health check
liquidation uses exchange rate derived from reserves

aiExpectedConcerns.title: Reserve donation can distort collateral value and enable self-liquidation

attackVector.description: Attacker inflates eToken exchange rate via reserve donations, then manipulates liquidation economics to extract value.
steps: Borrow against collateral to approach insolvency
Call donateToReserves to shift reserves and inflate exchange rate
Trigger liquidation with distorted collateral valuation
Self-liquidate or liquidate accounts at manipulated rate
